com.st.st25sdk.type2

Class DynamicLockType2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.type2.DynamicLockType2

  • public class DynamicLockType2
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines methods to handle Dynamic Lock Bits of a NFC Forum Type2 tag

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte FIRST_MEM_ADD_MANAGED_BY_DYNAMIC_LOCK
      First Memory address managed by Dynamic Locks
      static byte STATIC_AREA_MAX_SIZE
      Maximum number of bytes of the Static Area = CC File + 48 bytes User Memory.
      static byte STATIC_AREA_USER_MEMORY_MAX_SIZE
      Maximum number of bytes of the Static Area.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Field Detail

      • STATIC_AREA_MAX_SIZE

        public static final byte STATIC_AREA_MAX_SIZE
        Maximum number of bytes of the Static Area = CC File + 48 bytes User Memory. Upper memory space is managed by Dynamic Lock
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATIC_AREA_USER_MEMORY_MAX_SIZE

        public static final byte STATIC_AREA_USER_MEMORY_MAX_SIZE
        Maximum number of bytes of the Static Area. Upper memory space is managed by Dynamic Lock
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FIRST_MEM_ADD_MANAGED_BY_DYNAMIC_LOCK

        public static final byte FIRST_MEM_ADD_MANAGED_BY_DYNAMIC_LOCK
        First Memory address managed by Dynamic Locks
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamicLockType2

        public DynamicLockType2(DynamicLockType2Configuration dynamicLockConfig,
                        byte[] lockAreaBuffer)
        Constructor for a DynamicLockType2 object
        Parameters:
        dynamicLockConfig - Dynamic Lock Bytes configuration
        lockAreaBuffer - array of bytes containing Dynamic Lock bytes

    • Method Detail

      • getDynamicLockBitArray

        public byte[] getDynamicLockBitArray()
                              throws STException
        Read Dynamic Lock bits
        Returns:
        array containing each dynamic lock bits values (0x00=0 / 0x01=1)
        Throws:
        STException

      • getDynamicLockBitForMemoryAddress

        public byte getDynamicLockBitForMemoryAddress(int memoryAddress)
                                       throws STException
        Getter for Dynamic Lock bit corresponding to a specific memory address
        Parameters:
        memoryAddress - Address of the memory for which to get the dynamic lock value
        Returns:
        lock bit value for the specified memory address (00 or 01)
        Throws:
        STException - BAD_PARAMETER if the memory address is part of the memory managed by the Static Lock Area (up to address 0x3F)

      • isMemoryAddressLocked

        public boolean isMemoryAddressLocked(int memoryAddress)
                              throws STException
        Check if Dynamic Lock bit corresponding to the memory address is locked
        Parameters:
        memoryAddress - Memory Address
        Returns:
        true if lock bit value for the specified memory address = 1
        Throws:
        STException

      • setDynamicLockBit

        public byte[] setDynamicLockBit(int memoryAddress)
                         throws STException
        Set Dynamic Lock bit corresponding to the memory address
        Parameters:
        memoryAddress - Address of the memory for which to set the dynamic lock bit to 1
        Returns:
        updated Dynamic Lock Area buffer
        Throws:
        STException - BAD_PARAMETER if the memory address is part of the memory managed by the Static Lock Area (up to address 0x3F)

      • setAllDynamicLockBits

        public byte[] setAllDynamicLockBits()
                             throws STException
        set ALL Dynamic Lock bits to 1 (READ ONLY state)
        Returns:
        updated Dynamic Lock Area Buffer
        Throws:
        STException

      • areAllDynamicLockBitsSet

        public boolean areAllDynamicLockBitsSet()
                                 throws STException
        Check if ALL Dynamic Lock Bits are set to 1
        Returns:
        true if Read Only state detected
        Throws:
        STException

      • getLockBitNumberForMemoryAddress

        public int getLockBitNumberForMemoryAddress(int memoryAddress)
                                     throws STException
        Calculate Dynamic Lock bit number for a memory address
        Parameters:
        memoryAddress - Address of the memory for which to get the dynamic lock bit value
        Returns:
        lock bit number
        Throws:
        STException - BAD_PARAMETER if the memory address is part of the memory managed by the Static Lock Area (up to address 0x3F)

      • getStartAddressRangeForLockBit

        public int getStartAddressRangeForLockBit(int lockBitNumber)
        Calculate the minimum value of the address range managed by the dynamic lock bit
        Parameters:
        lockBitNumber - Dynamic lock bit number
        Returns:
        minimum address of the address range managed by the Dynamic lock bit

      • getEndAddressRangeForLockBit

        public int getEndAddressRangeForLockBit(int lockBitNumber)
        Calculate the maximum value of the address range managed by the dynamic lock bit
        Parameters:
        lockBitNumber - Dynamic lock bit number
        Returns:
        maximum address of the address range managed by the Dynamic lock bit
